General.Name: EA Holdings Bhd
General.Description: EA Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, provides business intelligence software and development, IT service management consultancy, and system integration services in Malaysia. The company operates through ICT Consultancy, Software Solution, RFID System, and F&B Distribution segments. It offers application development, maintenance, hardware system integration, and mechanical and engineering services, as well as supplies ICT software and equipment. The company also provides software applications, such as e-solutions, ICT consultancy services, and enterprise resource planning solutions. In addition, it offers RFID access control systems, building management systems, integrated security division, and mechanical and electrical engineering services. Further, the company engages in the sale and distribution of imported food items, such as fruit juices, premium biscuits, canned fruits, jams and spreads, olive oil, vinegar, and pasta. It sells its products under the Basso, Baronia, SICA or SICA Tomatoes, Loreto, Trucillo, Bonomi, Kronos, and D' Amico brands. The company serves government linked companies and statutory bodies. EA Holdings Berhad was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
